meanings.definition: Having the shape of half a cylinder.
meanings.sent1: The playground had a semicylindrical slide for the children to play on.
meanings.sent2: The semicylindrical roof of the building provided shelter from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The semicylindrical cake looked like a delicious half-cylinder treat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was semicylindrical, curving up at the edges like a crescent moon.
meanings.sent5: The semicylindrical vase held a beautiful bouquet of flowers.

meanings.sent1: The tunnel was a semicylindrical structure that trains passed through.
meanings.sent2: She found a semicylindrical piece of wood on the beach, perfect for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The semicylindrical pillow rolled off the bed and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The semicylindrical pipe reminded him of a miniature tunnel for ants.
meanings.sent5: The semicylindrical sculpture stood proudly in the center of the park.
